Questions.Question: According to the diagram, what are the main directories in a Hexagonal Architecture project?
Questions.Explanation: The diagram shows cmd/ (Entry points), domain/ (THE CORE), application/ (Use cases), adapters/ (Infrastructure), and config/ (Configuration) as the main directories.

Questions.Question: According to the lesson, what is the dependency direction in Hexagonal Architecture?
Options: All layers depend on each other equally
Questions.Explanation: The lesson states: Dependencies always point inward: Adapters → Application → Domain. Never: Domain → Adapters.

Questions.Question: According to the diagram, what belongs in the domain/ directory?
Questions.Explanation: The diagram shows domain/ containing entities/, services/, and repositories/ (interfaces). This is the core business logic.
